title: Hello World
description: This is the first post in the new Next.js blog.

body.raw:
# Hello World ðŸ‘‹

Welcome to the new blog built with **Next.js 14, Contentlayer, and TailwindCSS**.  

This is a sample post â€” edit or add more posts inside `src/content/posts/`.
